description:
Activision is proud to present Firehawk, a special kart in Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled, supporting veteran employment.  Firehawk is modeled after a classic military plane, but acts just like a kart in the game.

The full purchase price for this special item, less VAT, will be donated to non-profits that place veterans in the US and UK into high quality civilian jobs. This is a limited time offer that will end once $1 million has been raised for the cause.

Jet around the track and support a great cause with Firehawk!
name: Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled - The Firehawk Kart
